detailsSection:
The goal of Building a Release Pipeline with Team Foundation Server 2012 is to put you on the road toward continuous delivery. It explains how to progressively evolve the process you use to release software through techniques such as versioning, continuous integration, automation, and environment management. The guidance moves through a series of small iterations so that no single change you make is too drastic or disruptive.
This is a PDF version of the on-line guidance "Building a Release Pipeline with Team Foundation Server 2012."

Building a Release Pipeline with Team Foundation Server 2012 - EPUB.epub
systemRequirementsSection: To read the PDF or epub, you will need a document reader capable of displaying PDF / epub documents.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the 'Download' button to start the download.
  2. Save the file to your hard drive.
additionalInformationSection:
The accompanying Hands-on Labs are available at Building a Release Pipeline with Team Foundation Server 2012 – Hands-on Labs .
For help and support visit Building a Release Pipeline with Team Foundation Server 2012 MSDN Home Page or the Test Infrastructure Guidance Community Site
